item.title: Kerberized NFS with FreeIPA on CentOS 7 and Fedora 28
item.description: I have an NFS server on a KVM guest, and I want to integrate auth into my IdM server so I can have an automount readily accessible from any of the hosts. Most of my hosts are CentOS 7, but my personal laptop is running Fedora 28. What I’ve done already The FreeIPA server is already installed (refer to the Red Hat 7 IdM Install Guide) Replica is already installed and providing failover CA and DNS services Hosts are registered with the FreeIPA server Configure FreeIPA You need to add the service to both the client and server:
